recipes.name: Spaghetti
method: Cook meat in a pan on medium-high heat for 5 minutes
Add chopped Onions and Garlic and cook for 10 minutes
Add Pasta Sauce
Boil water
Cook Pasta
Drain pasta water and add to pan
Stir well
Serve

recipes.name: Chicken Rice
method: Wash rice with soap haha
Add 2 Tablespoons of Hainanese Rice Paste per cup of rice and stir well
Cook rice in the rice cooker
Boil chicken breast for 20 minutes
Slice cucumber and plate
Add cooked rice to plate
Chop boiled chicken into bite-sized bits and plate
Drizzle Sweet Soy across chicken, rice and cucumber
(Optional) Add Fried Garlic
Stir and serve

recipes.name: Honey Chicken Rice and Potato (for 4)
method: Chop up potato into bite-sized cubes
Add 1tbsp oregano, garlic powder, black pepper, salt, and olive oil
Chuck in air-fryer at 200-220 degrees for 10 minutes, take out, shake, then add back in for another 10 minutes
Chop up chicken into bite-sized cubes
Add 1tbsp paprika, garlic powder, black pepper, salt, and olive oil
On medium heat, add butter and minced garlic
Add the seasoned chicken and cook for 10 minutes
Add honey and BBQ Sauce and mix well
Package cooked rice, potato, chicken into 4 seperate containers for meal prep
